SQL_STMT_U.val:
Insert into dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange (Ebene1, Ebene2, Ebene3,Ebene4, DeviceID,Coleranttype,TonerArtNr, BeforeChangeValue,BeforeChangeDate,BeforeChangeTime,SupplyCapacity,AfterChangeValue,AfterChangeDate,AfterChangeTime)
Select a.Ebene1, a.Ebene2, a.Ebene3,a.Ebene4, a.deviceid,a.coleranttype,a.SUCArtnr,a.remainingvalue,a.erstelltam,a.erstelltum, ( Select f.Haltbarkeit_Kopien from ARTIKEL f where a.Ebene1=f.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=f.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=f.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=f.Ebene4 and ArtikelPart_Nr= (Select top 1 max(c.SUCArtnr) FROM Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.erstelltam>a.erstelltam and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 group by c.deviceid,c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum order by c.deviceid, c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum asc) ), ( Select top 1 max(c.remainingvalue) FROM Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.erstelltam>a.erstelltam and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 group by c.deviceid,c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum order by c.deviceid, c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum asc ), ( Select top 1 MAX(c.erstelltam) FROM Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.erstelltam>a.erstelltam and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 group by c.deviceid,c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum order by c.deviceid, c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum asc ) , ( Select top 1 MAX(c.erstelltum) FROM Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.erstelltam>a.erstelltam and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 group by c.deviceid,c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum order by c.deviceid, c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum asc ) from Supplies_WS_SQL a where a.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and coleranttype<>'' and a.erstelltum = ( Select max(b.erstelltum) from Supplies_WS_SQL b where b.deviceid= a.deviceid and b.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.erstelltam=b.erstelltam and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 )
and a.remainingvalue< ( Select top 1 max(c.remainingvalue) FROM Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.erstelltam>a.erstelltam and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 group by c.deviceid,c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum order by c.deviceid, c.erstelltam,c.erstelltum asc ) group by a.Ebene1, a.Ebene2, a.Ebene3,a.Ebene4,a.remainingvalue,a.erstelltam, a.erstelltum,a.deviceid,a.coleranttype,a.SUCArtnr order by a.deviceid,a.erstelltam, a.erstelltum
-- Soll erstest skirpt fÃ¼r f.Halbarkeit_Kopien ersetzen da einfacher mit SucArtnr abzufragen! update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set SupplyCapacity = ( Select f.Haltbarkeit_Kopien from Artikel f where a.Ebene1=f.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=f.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=f.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=f.Ebene4 and f.ArtikelPart_NR =a.TonerArtnr
) from dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
Update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set IDNR = ( Select Max(IDNR) from GERAETE b WHERE a.DeviceID = b.Berechnungsinterva and b.IDNR is not null and b.IDNR<>0 and b.Berechnungsinterva is not null and b.Berechnungsinterva<>0 and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 ) FROM dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
Update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set KundNr = ( Select Max(BETREIBER) from GERAETE b WHERE a.DeviceID = b.Berechnungsinterva and b.BETREIBER is not null and b.BETREIBER<>0 and b.Berechnungsinterva is not null and b.Berechnungsinterva<>0 and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 ) FROM dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
Update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set TonerDifference = ( Select case when ( Select c.AfterChangeValue from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) is null then ( Select b.remainingvalue from Supplies_WS_SQL b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and b.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and b.deviceid=a.deviceid and b.erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) and b.erstelltum = ( Select MIN(d.erstelltum) from Supplies_WS_SQL d where d.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and d.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and d.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=d.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=d.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=d.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=d.Ebene4 and erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) ) ) else (Select c.AfterChangeValue from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) end -a.BeforeChangeValue) FROM dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
Update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set PreviousAfterChangeValue = ( Select case when ( Select c.AfterChangeValue from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) is null then ( Select b.remainingvalue from Supplies_WS_SQL b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and b.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and b.deviceid=a.deviceid and b.erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) and b.erstelltum = ( Select MIN(d.erstelltum) from Supplies_WS_SQL d where d.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and d.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and d.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=d.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=d.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=d.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=d.Ebene4 and erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) ) ) else ( Select c.AfterChangeValue from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) end) FROM dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
Update dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange set PreviousAfterChangeDate = ( Select case when ( Select c.AfterChangeDate from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) is null then ( Select b.erstelltam from Supplies_WS_SQL b where a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and b.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and b.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and b.deviceid=a.deviceid and b.erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) and b.erstelltum = ( Select MIN(d.erstelltum) from Supplies_WS_SQL d where d.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and d.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and d.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=d.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=d.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=d.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=d.Ebene4 and erstelltam= ( Select MIN(c.erstelltam) from Supplies_WS_SQL c where c.supplytype in ('toner', 'tonerCartridge','ink','inkCartridge') and c.coleranttype=a.coleranttype and c.deviceid=a.deviceid and a.Ebene1=c.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=c.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=c.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=c.Ebene4 ) ) ) else ( Select c.AfterChangeDate from STAT_TFuellStandChange c where lfdNr= ( Select MAX(b.lfdNr) from STAT_TFuellStandChange b where b.lfdNr<a.lfdNr and a.Coleranttype=b.Coleranttype and a.IDNR = b.IDNR ) ) end) FROM dbo.STAT_TFuellStandChange a
